verse.name: c2
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deergha kaalamu prema dayachoopi Sahinchunu matsara padadee yuttama Prema dambamugaa naduvanidee prema Upponga nidee prema{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Swapraojanamunu eppudu koranidee Prema amaryaadaga naduvani prema Twaragaa kopa padani prema Thalachadu apakaaramunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Durneetilo gaaka satyaana santoshinchun Annitini thaalukonu prema Anniti nammi yorchedi prema Anniti nireekshinchun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Niluchunu vishwaasamu nireekshanayu Mari prema veetilo shresta mainadi Prema premanu kalgi yundutaku Prayatninchudi meeru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Premaleni vaadu devuni erugani vaadu Mana devudu prema swaroopi Thana prema manalo sampoorna Siddini ponda valayu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ninnadugu chunnaadu ninu preminchina Prabhu Yesu nannu preminchu chunnaavaa ? Veeri kante naapai neeku Ekkuva prema galadaa ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nanu preminchina yedala naa Yaajnalanu gaikonumu meelo meeru Okari nokaru preminchu konuchunna Yedala adiye mahaadaanandam{/lang-eng}
